text: Live Election Updates: Trump Returns to Pennsylvania as Biden Looks to Steady His Campaign  —  Vice President Kamala Harris and Jill Biden will also hold events in the key battleground state following the president's fiery speech in Detroit on Friday.  —  Trump will rally in Pennsylvania, as Biden allies hit the trail, too.

Joe Biden for President  —  I will do all that I can to see that President Biden is re-elected.  Why?  Despite my disagreements with him on particular issues, he has been the most effective president in the modern history of our country and is the strongest candidate to defeat Donald Trump — a demagogue and pathological liar.
